Class ServerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.LM26.observers.serverController.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.LM26.systemNetwork.serverNet.ViewGameInterface
        • it.polimi.ingsw.LM26.systemNetwork.serverNet.ServerBase

  • public class ServerBase
extends ViewGameInterface
    ServerBase class
    Author:
    Chiara Criscuolo It manages all connection in a HashMap and has a reference to Controller It has a lobby to collect all connections
